job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Title: ML EngineerLocation: Anywhere in US but willing to work Pacific hoursDuration: 6+ months ContractExperience : 8+ yearsAny Visa Except- CPT/OPT/ H1-T/*This is not an internship*Responsibilityâ Work closely with Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists to understand, refine, and prioritize requirementsâ Design and build our model serving service with simple, powerful APIs to capture our users/clients needsâ Build our core ML model lifecycle management system to provide an ML-aware release and deployment experienceâ Improve machine learning data quality by using & building tools to automatically detect issuesâ Create intelligent ML-aware real-time monitoring & observability systemsâ Work closely with partner teams to integrate with other ML tools to create a seamless end-to-end experienceâ Leverage open source technologies like Kubeflow, Kubernetes, Spark, Docker, Airflow, Tensorflow and PyTorchÂ QualificationWe are looking for engineers with:â 9+ years of industry experience or a PhD +7 years industry experience in applied machine learning.â Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalentâ Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensor flow or Pytorch is preferredâ Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in productionâ Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plusâ Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plusâ Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plusâ Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a big plusPlease reach out to farheen@exatechinc.com
